packing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: when you put things into cases or boxes so that you can send or take them somewhere
packing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I can do my packing the night before we leave.
packing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the material used for packing things so that they can be sent somewhere
packing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the process of wrapping goods or putting them in boxes, ready to be sent somewhere
packing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Tetra Pak have ruled out any interest in packing or distributing non-foods.
packing.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a list of goods that have been packed and are ready to send
packing.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The packing list read ‘Parts for a Dairy Plant’, but the contents were high-quality steel components more suited to weapons.
packing.translation[1].definitions[2].de: materials such as paper, card, plastic etc, used for packing things
packing.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: Farmingdale, N.Y., the maker of paperboard packing
